title: Welcome to the carriage house of Hamilton Hall !!
description:
Welcome to the carriage house of Hamilton Hall Ballroom lofts in Historic Old City. One of kind home tucked away from the bustle of the city on a cobblestone street. This boutique home is on the first floor of a 5 unit condo building with elevator. This home just underwent a stunning renovation throughout with no detail overlooked. Enter into main lobby area or through your own private entrance door by the 1 car parking garage with plenty of storage area and a garage door opener. You can have 2 car parking by parking in front of your own garage with parking painted parking square. Wide open floor plan with original Corinthian columns and 9+ ceilings. New white oak engineered hardwood floors with custom designer painted walls and trim. Oversized windows throughout and new wall sconces and high-hats for plenty of lighting. Kitchen custom designed with white luxury cabinetry w/ detailed handle hardware and gorgeous Quartz counters. Glazed 4 X 8 subway tile. Center island with seating for 3 more people to share in dining. Oversized living room for fun entertaining. Great space for watching the game or playing games. Master bedroom has plenty of windows and a new ceiling fan. Bathroom is detailed in glazed herringbone tile design with a new glass shower enclosure. Gray double vanity sinks with stately designed vanities. Walk in rainfall shower area with deluxe shower fixtures. Second bedroom has a ceiling fan and private 8X85 side yard with fenced bamboo for privacy. Walk score of 98 to great boutique stores, fabulous restaurants, Penns Landing waterfront, Franklin Park, Cherry Pier, Independence Hall, Constitution Center, Revolution Museum and so much more. Pets are allowed:)

title: 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 532 S 15th Street, #1! This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of of South Street, walking distance to Center City and Rittenhouse Square. Enter on main level into the spacious living, dining, and kitchen area with lovely bay window in the front. Your modern kitchen boasts beautiful white cabinetry, ample prep space, and sleek stainless steel appliances including electric stove + oven, dishwasher, and fridge. There's a large closet for storage by the kitchen area. Continue back to your 1st bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom features a vanity, window, and separate shower with glass door. Your bedroom is sizable and bright, with a gorgeous accent wall, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and large closet. There's a door that leads to your outside space - perfect for the warmer months! Head down the lower level to view your other bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom offers stunning floor-to-ceiling tiling, a lighted vanity, cabinet over the toilet, and a full size shower / tub combo. The 2nd bedroom features plush wall-to-wall carpeting, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's an additional storage area to the back, plus in-unit laundry and central a/c for added convenience. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this is a hot location right around the corner from tons of restaurants, cafes and bars. You'll be steps from the Lombard-South Station for the Broad Street Line, plus surrounded by public transportation bus routes. Walkable to the Marian Anderson Recreation Center and Rittenhouse Square. Check out neighborhood hotspots like Bob & Barbara's Lounge, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, Loco Pez, Tio Flores, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and monthly pet rent of $30/month for dogs and $25/month for cats). There is a maximum weight of 30lbs for dogs. Tenants responsible for: upfront payments of $125 for common area electricity + $395 for water. Tenants are also required to put PECO + wifi/cable in their name. (If a longer lease is secured, prepayments will be adjusted). Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: Massive 3 Bed 2 Bath Nyc Style Loft in the Heart of Northern Liberties
description:
Welcome to this massive 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, NYC style loft in the heart of Northern Liberties! This loft boasts over 1,850+ square feet of space in addition to the soaring 20+ feet high ceilings, with a private outdoor patio. Door to door service with the 1-car garage parking spot right outside the back door. Step inside to the open concept living and entertaining area complete with a sunken chef’s style kitchen and full breakfast bar. The large private primary bedroom on the main floor is complete with plenty of closet space. Recently renovated, you’ll love the brand new primary bathroom with glass enclosed waterfall shower and dual vanity sinks. Two flex spaces (the second living area + the sitting room) can be found in the home. One of them could absolutely be converted into a true third bedroom, nursery, or fantastic home office! The second floor loft space works perfectly as a second bedroom or living room/office area; also complete with lots of closet space and an ensuite full bathroom. This loft is complete with a full laundry room, ample closets and storage space throughout. The entrance door alone is surrounded by three deep closets - perfect for all of your storage, coat closet, pantry, and linen closet needs. Located just steps away from Jerry’s Bar, Standard Tap, Dolce Caffe, 3J’s Deli and all that N. 2nd Street has to offer! Only blocks from all of your favorite Northern Liberties & Fishtown hot spots, plus public transportation and access to all of the major highways. title: Welcome Home to This Stunning 2 Bed, 1 Bath Unit at the Lefleur Condo!
description:
*** $100/m Rent Discount Incentive for a November Lease start date and 16 -18 month lease term! *** Welcome home to this stunning two bedroom, one bath unit at the LeFleur Condominum. This immaculately maintained home features 10 ft ceilings, gorgeous hardwood floors, and oversized windows that fill the home with natural light. A gourmet kitchen showcases modern cabinetry, sleek granite counters, stainless steel appliances, glass tilework, and a convenient custom concrete island/breakfast bar. The open layout floor plan is perfect for entertaining and the home has been upgraded with a smart lighting system and custom window treatments. The master bedroom includes a walk-in closet, and the spa-like full bathroom features modern fixtures and a beautiful tiled bath surround. Perfectly located where Bella Vista meets Washington Square West, this home is in a boutique condominium centrally located for easy access to the best of Center City living (Whole Foods and ACME, Seger and Palumbo Parks, the 13th St Restaurant corridor, South Street and the Italian Market are steps away), and is convenient to public transportation, Jefferson, Pennsylvania Hospital, and more!

title: This Unit You Will Find a Spacious Kitchen With Granite Counters!!
description:

This kitchen features a large eat in area, with plenty of cabinet and counter space. Off of the kitchen is a storage area. From the kitchen you will head into the spacious and sun filled living and dining area. On your way from the kitchen there is a half bath to the left . The living room opens up to your new deck for all of your outdoor entertaining needs. Head upstairs where you will first find the main suite, featuring multiple closets and an on suite bath. Down the hall you will find the convenient second floor laundry with a brand new washing machine, and the full bath for the second and third bedrooms. The second and third bedroom are spacious and private from the main suite. This property is around the corner from 76, close to public transportation, walk-able to giant, whole foods, trader joes, Rittenhouse, and the art museum neighborhood. This location has it all, and this unit comes with a parking spot!
214-30 N 22nd St #13L (14A)

title: WOW, MODERN TOWNHOUSE FEATURED IN PHILADELPHIA MAGAZINE!
description:
WOW, MODERN TOWNHOUSE FEATURED IN PHILADELPHIA MAGAZINE! Here is a rare opportunity to live in a modern townhouse on a tree-lined, quiet Center City street. This beautifully maintained, eight-year-old home has an open floor plan on the first floor with a magnificent kitchen that leads to an ultra-private backyard with twinkle lights, wood decking, a chalkboard-paint wall, and a one-of-a-kind mural by local artist Kaitlin Chow. The second floor has 2 spacious bedrooms, generous closet space, and a full bath. The entire third floor is a primary suite with a custom paint treatment, 2 oversized closets including a custom closet system, and a full bath with large, glass-enclosed shower and double vanity - a rare find in Center City! Continue to the fourth floor for a roof deck offering views of the city. The finished basement has high ceilings, a laundry area, plenty of storage, and a half bath. This home is full of smart modern touches: video doorbell, dual-zone air conditioning and heating with Nest thermostats, high ceilings, wide stairs, hardwood floors, hardwired smoke detectors and sprinklers, custom blackout blinds, freshly painted walls, and more. 1309 Rodman Street is in the McCall School catchment, and a couple of blocks to Whole Foods, Acme, the Kimmel Center, Seger Park, and the hottest restaurants of Midtown Village and Rittenhouse.
1309 Rodman St

title: LIVE AT PARK TOWNE PLACE APARTMENT HOMES IN CENTER CITY!!
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. The community is nestled between green acres on the Benjamin Franklin Parkway in the heart of Center City Philadelphia's Museum District. Park Town. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
2200 Benjamin Franklin Pkwy #0B-N0202

title: Spacious 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Apt $500 Security Deposit to Move-in!
description:
Just 1st month's rent and $500 security deposit to move-in!!! The Society Hill Building is a beautiful mid-rise community located in the Society Hill/Washington Square neighborhood of Center City. This building features spacious 1 bedroom 1 bath apartments, overlooking scenic Washington Square Park. The Society Hill Building is within walking distance of historic Old City as well as close to all forms of public transportation. 10 foot high ceilings, controlled access keypad entry, hardwood floors in some units, abundant natural light, dishwasher, microwave, high-efficiency individually controlled A/C and heat. Laundry on each floor and pet-friendly! Brand new windows in all apartments. Pictures are of a similar unit.
701 Sansom St #206

title: Beautiful Rental in the Heart of Center City is Waiting for You
description:
Beautiful rental in the heart of Center City is waiting for you, a gorgeous sunny one-bedroom, one-bath condominium at the Packard Grande. Totally roomy loft-like open floor plan is south-facing with incredible skyline views which are pretty breathtaking!! High up on the 22nd floor, this unit has an ultimate open layout, southern views which really come to life at night providing an exciting feast for your senses and in the morning energizing sunrises...The open kitchen is huge perfect place for entertaining, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and ample cabinet space. Huge Spa-like bathroom features Italian ceramic tile chrome fixtures and a ceramic sink with storage vanity, huge bedroom with ample closet space as well.. be in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, come enjoy your new life.
111 S 15th St #2209

title: Renovated Bi-level 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Squ
description:
Renovated Bi-level 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!! This boutique vintage building has all of the historic charm of a converted brownstone paired with modern updates throughout making for stylish and comfortable living. Enjoy restored hardwood floors and a kitchen with brand new appliances and a huge in unit laundry closet. Upstairs you will find a large bedroom with lots of windows that can accomodate any size bed and perfect for at home office set up. There is also a brand new renovated bathroom. The spiral staircase provides access to both floors but also exterior access to hallways on both floors for easy move in. PETS WELCOME! Many parking garages close by. Only first month and 1 month security needed at signing.
2015 Walnut St #201

title: Sun-soaked 1-Bed Filled With Charm Available at the Historic Touraine!
description:
No. 710: Sun-soaked one bedroom filled with charm available at the Historic Touraine Building. This home features a large, fully appointed kitchen with Custom French Country Cabinetry, subway tile, and peninsula for your guests to sit while you’re cooking. The open floorplan also boasts a large closet outfitted with a custom closet kit, and crown molding in the living space. The Touraine: Formerly an elegant residential hotel built in 1917, The Touraine combines original architectural details with modern comforts. The Touraine is Philadelphia's most central and beautiful address. Located on a tree-lined block of Spruce Street, the Touraine is just a quick walk to Rittenhouse Square, the Avenue of the Arts, and all the transportation and shopping of Center City. Ours is a thriving community of locally owned businesses from craft beer to great coffee, bike repair to bagels, and countless beloved BYOB's where you can dine outside. Our block is home to exquisite buildings and vibrant street life. TouraineÃƒÂ¢Ã‚Â€Ã‚Â™s residents enjoy 24/7 Front Desk Staff, 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, on-site Management, Package Reception, Online Rent Pay and Service Request Entry through our Resident Portal which can be accessed online or with an app, our Fitness Center & Yoga Studio, Curated Workshops, Hospitality Suites, complimentary and secure document shredding, composting, recycling, Business Center, and more. **Pictures are of a different unit with the same floor plan.

title: Unique Townhomes Offer an Exciting Opportunity to Enjoy Luxury Living!
description:
Introducing SoNo26, a premier living destination in Philadelphia?s Northern Liberties. Our unique townhomes offer an exciting opportunity to enjoy luxury living while being in the center of all the city has to offer. Stroll and shop along Liberty Walk or enjoy a gourmet meal at one of the critically acclaimed restaurants, bars and cafes. The homes at SoNo26 feature all of the high quality finishes you?ve come to expect from a Premier Access property. Step inside your front door and you will be greeted with a spacious open concept living and dining area with beautifully designed windows that offer magnificent natural sunlight. The living area flows nicely into the top of the line gourmet kitchen which features Arctic Quartz countertops, Bosch appliances and custom cabinets making this kitchen the perfect space to entertain friends. Open the sliding glass doors and you will find your back patio where you can enjoy your morning cup of coffee or glass of wine after dinner. Leading off of the kitchen are stairs to take you down to your full finished basement with washer and dryer and half bath giving you a great added space for guests or an entertainment center. Head back up the stairs and continue to the second floor where you will find two spacious bedrooms with large closets and plenty of storage as well as two bathrooms for your convenience. On the upper floor you will enter into the large master suite with incredible walk in closets and master bath with double sinks that will make you feel right at home. On the top floor you will find your unbelievable roof deck that offers spectacular views of the Philadelphia skyline making this a relaxing at home retreat. To add on to all that SoNo26 has to offer, each unit comes with 1 car parking to ensure you never have a problem finding a space for your car. These brand new units will not last long set up your showing today and come home to SoNo26!
318 Potts Pl
